column3: Description
Oily and moist chunks of herring with savoury and fishy undertones.
A small and dense fish, oily in texture with a light savoury taste.
A rich and oily chunk of tuna with a tender texture.
A strong clam with a nice salty and fishy taste. A classic.
Meaty white flesh with a mild and sweet flavor.
A soft but firm cod filet with a milky and mild taste.
Slightly fishy and savoury flesh, with a mineral sweetness to it.
A small but delicious shrimp with fishy and sweet undertones.
A soft and mild-flavored filet that melts in your mouth.
White and subtly sweet flesh with a mild delicate flavour.
Sweet and delicate lobster flesh. Very satisfying and rich flavour.
A creamy and slightly salty fish. Robust and meaty.
A firm flesh with a fairly pronounced flavour, and mild fishy undertones.
Sweet tasting white flesh, firm and meaty.
A dry-cured and smoked meat cut from a pig's belly.
A fine-textured meat with an intense flavour and earthy notes.
A piece of white meat with a light and savoury flavour.
A chunk of tender red meat with a light earthy flavour.
A fatty and rich chunk of meat with salty and savoury undertones.
A tender meat with a strong and pleasant flavour.
A smoky and juicy cut of pig's leg. Cooked on the bone for extra flavour.
A small piece of delicious roasted ham.
A big and juicy piece of tender beef meat.
A fairly dry yet tasty salted meat snack.
Sweet and earthy with a slight bitter aftertaste.
A bunch of small crunchy brussel sprouts. Nutty and sweet.
A handful of buttery nuts with a sweet taste.
Sour, but refreshing.
A tangy fruit with a buttery texture that melts in the mouth.
A cob of corn slathered in butter, with a sprinkle of salt.
Crunchy and earthy. Packed with vitamins.
A juicy tropical fruit with a deliciously sweet taste.
A small clementine packed with flavour.
Juicy, sweet and refreshing. The essential one.
Plump and earthy with a spongey texture. Rich in proteins.
A ripe apple with a satisfying crunch.
A delicate spear of asparagus.
A velvety apricot with a tangy and sweet taste.
Homemade and comforting pastry, filled with sweet apple compote.
